name: posthog-github-action
description: Send events to PostHog from GitHub Actions

scripts.build: npm run build:main && npm run build:pre && npm run build:post
scripts.build:pre: ncc build pre.js -o dist-pre --minify && mv dist-pre/index.js dist/pre.js && rm -rf dist-pre
scripts.build:post: ncc build post.js -o dist-post --minify && mv dist-post/index.js dist/post.js && rm -rf dist-post

author: PostHog
